TopicTitle: Space Station Parts Addon with Windows?

Articles.Content:
Hello! I'm looking for an addon that was used in this youtube video:

I want to construct space stations with glowing windows so I can see it when it's on the dark side of the planet. Does anyone know what this addon is called? The maker of the video had some links in the info but the destinations don't match up anymore.
He's not just another youtuber... He's a Viking! A glorious Viking!
